plot: Down on McAllister's farm there's a cow, a pitchfork, a haggard man, an evil wife, and a bucket-headed robot. Not to mention a lust that will test the limits of marriage and metal fatigue. Both touching and oddly arousing, this comedy of errors will make you believe in the love between a man, woman and robot.
title: Farmer McAllister's Thinkin' Machine
